text: avanāṇ niṅṅaḷe maṇṇil ninn sr̥ṣṭiccat. pinne bījakaṇattil ninn. pinnīṭ bhrūṇattilninnuṁ. tuṭarnn śiśuvāyi avan niṅṅaḷe puṟattukeāṇṭuvarunnu. atinuśēṣaṁ niṅṅaḷ karuttunēṭānāṇit. avasānaṁ niṅṅaḷ vr̥d'dharāyittīrānuṁ. niṅṅaḷil cilar nēratte tanne maraṇamaṭayunnu. niṅṅaḷkku niścayikkappeṭṭa avadhiyilettānumāṇit. oruvēḷa niṅṅaḷ cinticc manas'silākkiyeṅkilēā
